name: Space Shooter (wizardsmana)
description: The second game I decided to make is a simple space shooter game.  Some day I may go back and expand on this game to allow enemies to randomly spawn from the left, right and top of the screen.  I'd also add different ship choices for the player as well as different types of enemy ships with different strengths and weaknesses.  Until then, enjoy this simple destroy as many bad guys as you can type of game!
